column5: Broaden your mind with Northumbria University’s online Psychology MSc (conversion course).Whether you’re looking to start a career as a psychologist or want to strengthen your understanding of the human mind to further your career, this distance learning Psychology MSc will unlock your potential. This BPS-accredited conversion course is designed to help graduates of any subject make the leap into psychology. It’s here you’ll develop a core understanding of psychology and gain the qualification needed for Graduate Membership to the BPS (GBC) ‒ an essential milestone on your journey towards becoming a Chartered Psychologist in the UK.
